title: Residence at Merrillville Lakes has what you are looking for!!!!!!!
posting_body: Are you in the market for a one bedroom?
Here at the Residence at Merrillville Lakes, we have several one-bedroom apartments available.
old, we are a senior active living community.

All we ask is that you are able to make two and half times the rent, our bedrooms are going for $1200- but we are offering two months free rent pro-rated over 16 months, but you must apply right away and be moved in by June 30, 2022.

If you are interested in setting an appointment for a tour- please call Diana Thomas at 219 650-5000, or if you are interested in applying for an apartment- go to merrillvillelakes.net- the application fee is $45.00 per adult.
You must apply right away- we have our vacancies on our website.
One bedroom $1200.00   Two bedroom $1450.00   Two bedroom/Two baths $1500.00
